actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend section 11 of the Housing Opportunity Program Extension Act of 1996 to facilitate the use of certain assistance made available for self-help housing providers.

summary.text: Shop Grant Extension Act - Amends the Housing Opportunity Program Extension Act of 1996, with respect to grants made available to self-help housing providers for FY 1998, to provide a 48-month period before funds are subject to recapture based upon failure to use the funds, or to fulfill grant terms.

titles.title: To amend section 11 of the Housing Opportunity Program Extension Act of 1996 to facilitate the use of certain assistance made available for self-help housing providers.
